name: Abyss of Hell
description:
It's an Action Platformer game. The protagonist has to pass through traps, obstacles and defeat monsters or bosses in each floor in order to pass to the next floor. But when he dies, he will be reborn at the beginning. The protagonist can develop himself continuously. After defeating each boss level, the boss will drop skill items for players to use. At the start of each new level, players will be able to spend money and spirits dropped by monsters to upgrade their attack and health stats.

How To Play

Players have to kill all enemies in order to be able to pass through the level, there will be many traps Players have to dodge traps, trying to lose as little blood as possible in order to fight the boss. If the player dies, the player must Resume the safe zone and can upgrade the health stats and attack power at 2 NPCs in the safe zone. The player's death to come back to upgrade will increase the character's strength to pass the next level. more easily

PC Controls :

  • A D  -  Move
  • Mouse Left & Mouse Right  -  Attack
  • Spacebar  -  Jump
  • E  -  Skill
  • Shift  -  Dash
